Definition: You will be given four sentences of a story written in natural language. The story is incomplete and you must select one of the sentence choices from (A) and (B) to complete the story such that it sounds fully coherent.

 (A) He is happy now. (B) He joined a gang.
Positive Examples.explanation: As mentioned in fourth sentence, the incident turned a new leaf to Rick's life; so, he must be happy now.
